alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Livingston; Monroe; Northern Cayuga; Ontario; Oswego; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WAYNE...SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON...CAYUGA...NORTHERN ALLEGANY...SOUTHWESTERN OSWEGO... SOUTHEASTERN MONROE AND ONTARIO COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM EDT... At 1244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fairport to near Hemlock to near Belfast. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Canandaigua, East Rochester, Fairport, Dansville, Newark, Marion, Lyons, Palmyra, Victor, Honeoye Falls, Conesus, Bristol, Lima, Clifton Springs, Clyde, Phelps, Belfast, Bloomfield, and Montezuma. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 6. Interstate 90 between exits 42 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and western New York.

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Livingston; Monroe; Northern Cayuga; Ontario; Oswego; Wayne
